name: FightBit
description:
FightBit is a side-scrolling beat-em-up with pseudo 8-bit graphics and rudimentary gameplay influenced by contemporary melee focused combat games. Players will travel through an invaded town, encountering various enemies with various attack patterns, with many requiring their own set of strategies to defend against. Attacking and evading during crucial moments in combat will be necessary to remain advantageous as making mistakes yields consequences.

Features:
  • Fight various enemies with various attack patterns
  • Pseudo 8-bit graphics
  • Electronic rock soundtrack
